name: SuddenlyBunnies
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 42 in collaboration with my daughter.

Theme: Running out of Space.

A game with clicker elements where you have to survive an onslaught of bunnies taking over your house. Tip: Click like crazy. Look at rules in game for more details.

Also have a look at the game my wife and daughter made: FoxyPops
